text: Although my course was cancelled, the Singapore Red Cross team was very responsive and helpful with my refund request. They provided clear information and support throughout the process. I appreciate their professionalism, and Iâ€™m looking forward to joining their Standard First Aid course in the future!

Instructor Da Wei has been really engaging and sharing very valuable experiences he has with the class. He also gives very good tips on how to improve CPR techniques as well as what can be done. The scenarios he gives also allows us to better be prepared for what could potentially happen.

Standard first aid course was great! Super helpful, Da Wei (instructor) is also very knowledge and shares information succinctly. When asked questions about real life scenario, he also promptly answers them. He also takes the time to help us critical think in a real life situation by asking questions.

Great learning experience and learning environment!
Enjoyed my experience and learning over here at red cross with Liv and Dawei. They both were very professional and informative. Highly recommend to take up courses related to first aid training.

Very detailed and fun training session!! I have enjoyed the past 2 days of learning :) Da Wei is very engaging and detailed with his lessons. He showed a lot of knowledge and gave us many scenarios that may occur in real life.
